ALPHA TOCOPHERYL ACETATE

  • Indications and doses
  • Pregnancy
  • Side effects
  • Administration
  • Cautions
  • Medicinal forms

Indications and doses

Vitamin E deficiency,

By mouth

  • For children
    2–10 mg/kg daily, increased if necessary up to 20 mg/kg daily.

Malabsorption in cystic fibrosis,

By mouth

  • For adults
    100–200 mg once daily, dose to be adjusted as necessary, to be taken with food and pancreatic enzymes.
  • For children 1–11 months
    50 mg once daily, dose to be adjusted as necessary, to be taken with food and pancreatic enzymes.
  • For children 1–11 years
    100 mg once daily, dose to be adjusted as necessary, to be taken with food and pancreatic enzymes.
  • For children 12–17 years
    100–200 mg once daily, dose to be adjusted as necessary, to be taken with food and pancreatic enzymes.

Vitamin E deficiency in cholestasis and severe liver disease,

By mouth

  • For children 1 month–11 years
    Initially 100 mg daily, adjusted according to response, increased if necessary up to 200 mg/kg daily.
  • For children 12–17 years
    Initially 200 mg daily, adjusted according to response, increased if necessary up to 200 mg/kg daily.

Malabsorption in abetalipoproteinaemia,

By mouth

  • For adults
    50–100 mg/kg once daily.

Advice when patient is pregnant

No evidence of safety of high doses.

Known side effects

General side effects

notKnown: Abdominal pain (particularly with high doses), diarrhoea (particularly with high doses),

Directions for administration

In neonates

Consider dilution of oral suspension for use in neonates due to high osmolality.

Cautions regarding administration

  • : Increased risk of necrotising enterocolitis in neonate weighing less than 1.5 kg or in a preterm neonate in neonates
  • predisposition to thrombosis

Prepared medicinal forms of ALPHA TOCOPHERYL ACETATE

There can be variation in the licensing of different medicines containing the same drug.

Forms available from special-order manufacturers include: chewable tablet,
Chewable tablet
Capsule
Oral suspension
Cream
Not applicable
